channel.title: CVE Feed for Progress Software Corporation -- Sitefinity

item.title: CVE-2023-6784|2024-08-02T08:42:07.414Z -- progress%20software%20corporation -- sitefinity
item.description: A malicious user could potentially use the Sitefinity system for the distribution of phishing emails.

item.title: CVE-2024-4882|2024-07-22T20:10:23.859Z -- progress%20software%20corporation -- sitefinity
item.description: The user may be redirected to an arbitrary site in Sitefinity 15.1.8321.0 and previous versions.
